Package com.paymybudy.transfer.dal.service

Class MoneyTransferService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paymybudy.transfer.dal.service.MoneyTransferService
  • @Service
public class MoneyTransferService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service controls Money transfer between two internal accounts

    this service uses transactional SQL

    • Method Detail

      • sendMoney

        public void sendMoney​(User fromUser,
                      User toUser,
                      InternalTransaction internalTransaction)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Send Money from one to another user

        Different Steps

        • transaction creation
        • check internal accounts existence
        • build MoneyTransferType for credit and debit (transactional)
        • add and remove credit (transactional)
        • update transaction status
        Parameters:
        fromUser - user wants to give money
        toUser - user will received money
        internalTransaction - transaction relative
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception

      • sendMoneyPreparation

        @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRES_NEW,
               rollbackFor={IntMoneyTransferPreparationException.class,java.lang.Exception.class})
void sendMoneyPreparation​(User fromUser,
                          User toUser)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Check transfer Money mandatory component
        • check internal accounts existence,
        • build MoneyTransferType for credit and debit (transactional)
        Parameters:
        fromUser - user wants to give money
        toUser - user will received money
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - specific exception for preparation of the money transfer

      • sendMoneyExecution

        @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRES_NEW,
               rollbackFor={IntMoneyTransferExecutionException.class,java.lang.Exception.class})
void sendMoneyExecution​(User fromUser,
                        User toUser)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Money transfer execution, main method
        • add and remove credit (transactional)
        • update transaction status if transfer OK
        Parameters:
        fromUser - user wants to give money
        toUser - user will received money
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - specific exception for money transfer execution

      • addAmount

        @Transactional(propagation=MANDATORY)
void addAmount​(User user,
               boolean isCredit)
        throws IntMoneyTransferExecutionException
        Money transfer execution: change cash account
        Parameters:
        user - user concerned by the change of tha balance of its account
        isCredit - is a credit or a debit: true for credit
        Throws:
        IntMoneyTransferExecutionException - specific exception for money transfer execution
